item.description: Misinformed Democratization example citation [@krycho:revelation:2015, Â¶6] Examples of the misatribution of liberalization to democratization Democracy can be defined as: A system of government by the whole population or all the eligible members of a state, typically through elected representatives. After this definition, the meaning is distorted To put it more simply, democratic governments answer to their citizens. Through voting, people frame the institutions that govern them.
